name: Tree Squad
description:
Short game originally created for Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam. Since I started late I couldn't submit it but I finished within a week and uploaded it here to share with the World :)

--------------

Current version: Feb. 25th 2021. v0.1 -- Initial version. 

--------------

Theme: Stronger Together.

What's it about?

Planet's are dying because of pollution created by factories. Your mission is to create a forest that can purify the air before it is too late. Trees purifying powers are stronger the more trees you plant.

Each season hides random hazards and beneficial events.

Goal: Make the pollution counter reach 0% by purifying the air with a Tree Squad.

How to play: On Spring plant new trees on fertile soil. During the rest of the year, research the infertile soil for a chance to make it fertile.

  • Plant new trees: click the "Pollinize" button and then click on a fertile soil.
  • Research: click the "Research" button and the click on a potentially fertile soil.

You can plant 1 tree each Spring but there are some special events that will grant more trees per year.

You can research once per Season.

Be sure to go back to the main screen once you achieved victory to unlock higher challenge configuration.

Credits:

  • Concept and Programming by Pamela Clunes.
  • Art and sound from Unity Assets store, specific credits can be found in-game.
